title.rendered: University of Alberta Admission Application Deadlines 2024

content.rendered:
This is to inform all students seeking admission into Alberta University that the online screening is open for the 2024 academic session

Registration Dates and the Terms Deadline are as follows:

Dates and Deadlines

Timeline for 2024

Please view this page for deadline to accept admission offer for Fall 2024 Dental and Dentistry.

October 1, 2024 Opening application date for admission, awards, and residence
October 1, 2024 Opening application date for Spring & Summer 2024 admission.
October 15, 2024 Open House
January 11, 2024 Entrance Award Application Deadline
February 13, 2024 All students can submit new final high school marks in application.
February 16, 2024 Deadline to submit Program Change Request form.
March 1, 2024 Deadline to submit admission application for most programs.
March 31, 2024 Deadline to accept admission offer for Fall 2024 Juris Doctor (Law) program.
April 6, 2024 Class Schedule released in Bear Tracks for planning purposes.
April 30, 2024 Deadline to self-report final high school marks in application.
April 30, 2024* Deadline for new students to apply to North Campus residences for a guaranteed spot. Applications may still be considered after this date.
April 2024 Registration for Courses for Fall 2024 opens
March & April 2024 Attend a Registration 101 Workshop
May 1, 2024 Deadline to accept admission offers made before April 1.  However, admission evaluations are done on a rolling basis. If you receive an offer after April 1, view this page for deadline information. Your offer acceptance deadline can be found on your Launchpad.
June 15, 2024
 Deadline for post-secondary applicants to submit final transcripts and other requirements.
July 2024 Attend a Student Loan Workshop
August 1, 2024 Deadline to submit outstanding documents for high school students. For Alberta applicants, high school transcripts are automatically obtained on your behalf and are typically received by the Registrar’s Office in early August.
September 2024 Classes begin!

*Deadline for new students to apply for guaranteed first-year housing on North Campus Residence. Applications may still be considered after this date.

Application Processing

  • Visit the Alberta university email to get your form
  • Submit your application form and all required documents,
  • An admissions advisor has to review your documents and process your application which can take 1 – 8 weeks before you can receive more information from us.
  • You will receive an email and your Launchpad status page will be updated when this is complete.
  • If we require any further information or documents, we will contact you directly through your form details.
  • We appreciate your patience while we are working with a high volume of applications. No additional application status details are available only via phone/email.

 To avoid installment charges:     

If you pay all fall and Winter Term fees by the Fall Term Fee Payment Deadline or all spring and Summer Term fees by the Spring deadline, you will avoid a $40 installment charge.
